item.title: [PI] 317 Help with crowns
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

String s;
				if(myPlayer != null && myPlayer.name != null)
				s =  myPlayer.name;

				else
					s = TextClass.fixName(capitalize(myUsername));
					
				
				if(myPrivilege > 0) {
					modIcons[myPrivilege-1].drawSprite(11, 122);
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s + ":", 25, 133, 0, -1);
				} else {
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s + ":", 11, 133, 0, -1);
				}
								

				if(is508) {
					qc.drawSprite(textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s) + 11, 123);
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s, 11, 133, 0, -1);
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(":", (25 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s)), 133, 0, -1);
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(inputString + ((loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "<col=0>|" : ""), 23 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s + ": "), 133 ,255 , -1);
					DrawingArea.method339(121, 0x807660, 506, 7);
				} else {
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(inputString + "*", 12 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s + ": "), 133, 255, -1);
					DrawingArea.method339(121, 0x807660, 506, 7);
				}
			}
		}
		drawChannelButtons();
		chatBackImage.drawGraphics(338, super.graphics, 0);
		inGameScreen.initDrawingArea();
		Texture.anIntArray1472 = anIntArray1182;
	}

try that.

				if(myPrivilege > 0) {
					modIcons[myPrivilege-1].drawSprite(11, 122);
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s + ":", 25, 133, 0, -1);
				} else {
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s + ":", 11, 133, 0, -1);
				}

is what I changed.

Responded to your pm but i’ll put it here also
[spoiler]String s;
if(myPlayer != null && myPlayer.name != null)
s = myPlayer.name;

			else
				s = TextClass.fixName(capitalize(myUsername));
				
			
			 if(myPrivilege > 0) {
                                    modIcons[myPrivilege-1].drawSprite(11, 122);
                                    
                           } else {
                                    newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s, 25, 133, 0, -1);
                            }
							

			if(is508) {
				qc.drawSprite(textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s) + 11, 123);
				newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s, 11, 133, 0, -1);
				newRegularFont.drawBasicString(":", (25 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s)), 133, 0, -1);
				newRegularFont.drawBasicString(inputString + ((loopCycle % 40 < 20) ? "<col=0>|" : ""), 23 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s + ": "), 133 ,255 , -1);
				DrawingArea.method339(121, 0x807660, 506, 7);
			} else {
				newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s + ":", 11, 133, 0, -1);
				newRegularFont.drawBasicString(inputString + "*", 12 + textDrawingArea.getTextWidth(s + ": "), 133, 255, -1);
				DrawingArea.method339(121, 0x807660, 506, 7);
			}
		}
	}
	drawChannelButtons();
	chatBackImage.drawGraphics(338, super.graphics, 0);
	inGameScreen.initDrawingArea();
	Texture.anIntArray1472 = anIntArray1182;
}[/spoiler]

item.title: [PI] 317 Help with crowns
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I’ve got an answer for # 2.
Yours might be different depending if you added the 498 look alike chat engine or not (or whatever).

Find the method
drawChatArea()

At the bottom you should have something like:

			if (myPlayer != null && myPlayer.name != null)
				s = myPlayer.name;
			else
				s = TextClass.fixName(capitalize(myUsername));[/code]
A few lines under that is this string (or similar)

newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s, 11, 133, 0, -1);

We're going to replace that string with:
[code=java]				if(myPrivilege > 0) {
					modIcons[myPrivilege-1].drawSprite(11, 122);
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s, 25, 133, 0, -1);
				} else {
					newRegularFont.drawBasicString(s, 11, 133, 0, -1);
				}

That should draw your mod icon if you have rights above 0. if not it won’t.

Source: I just tested this on my client.

Read full topic
